H0.text: Created in August 1991, ‘info.cern.ch’ was the first ever what. Website Domain

H1.text: Created in August 1991, ‘info.cern.ch’ was the first ever what. Internet Portal

H2.text: Created in August 1991, ‘info.cern.ch’ was the first ever what. Online Repository

H3.text: Created in August 1991, ‘info.cern.ch’ was the first ever what. W3s

A4.text: The first web site (https://info.cern.ch/) was published on 20 December 1990.

A6.text: The first website was created in August 1991 by Tim Berners-Lee at CERN.

A7.text: info.cern.ch was intended to be the CERN home page; however the DNS records were never switched.

A8.text: The first Web pages that described the project itself.
